humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the invasive component of the tumor as 6.4 x 5.2 x 2.5 cm. According to the rules provided, a T3 tumor is defined as being more than 5 cm. In this case, the largest dimension of the tumor is 6.4 cm, which is greater than 5 cm, so the T stage is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The size of the invasive component of the tumor is reported as 6.4 x 5.2 x 2.5 cm. According to the TNM staging system for cancer, a T2 stage is assigned when the tumor is greater than 2 cm but not greater than 5 cm in its greatest dimension. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
